talents.desc: Withering Fire deals 200% bonus damage to Minions and Mercenaries.
talents.name: Barbed Shot

talents.desc: Activate to poison an enemy Hero, dealing 179.96 damage over 10 seconds.
talents.name: Envenom

talents.desc: Minions and Mercenaries that die under the effects of Black Arrows explode, dealing 75 (+9 per level) damage to nearby enemies.
talents.name: Unstable Poison

talents.desc: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 140 (+18 per level) damage and Silencing enemies in an area making them unable to use Abilities for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically when it reaches maximum range.
talents.name: Wailing Arrow

talents.desc: You gain 10% Movement Speed for 2 seconds whenever an enemy is hit with Withering Fire, stacking up to 30%.
talents.name: Evasive Fire

talents.desc: Shadow Dagger makes enemies Vulnerable, taking 25% more damage, but the range of Shadow Dagger is reduced by 25%.
talents.name: Cold Embrace

talents.desc: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
talents.name: Bolt of the Storm
